package FebWeek4;

public class Ass1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		for(int i=1;i<=5;i++) {
			for(int j=1;j<=i;j++) {
				System.out.print("* ");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
		for(int n=1;n<=4;n++) {
			for(int k=4;k>=n;k--) {
				System.out.print("* ");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}

	}

}
